Review Name: Brilliant Review Description: Superb Product. Excellent Cooling Efficiency. Killer Price from flipkart. Almost 7k difference in price. Installation was done by LG Service next day itself and excellent installation staffs.Very powerful air conditioner. Small indoor unit though killer performance actually a very good advantage as many apartments having small gap provided for AC installation. Rocking service by flipkart as usual.
